title: Laws About Holiness and Justice
summary: Leviticus 19 calls Israel to imitate God's holiness in everyday life. It includes commandments about justice, honesty, kindness to others, and reverence for God. The command to 'love your neighbor as yourself' is found here.

faq.question: What does it mean to be holy?
faq.answer: To be set apart by living according to God's commands in every area of life.
